Text: Possible VirusThis message was passed on to me and I did have the virus on my computer which means you probably have it as well because you are in my address book The antivirus did not detect this Please read and do the following to get this off of your machine Dear Friends and email correspondents This is a serious email I antivirus an email from a work associated warning of a virus that was passed on to him His PC was infected and since I was in his address book it had probably spread to my computer I followed the instructions and located the virus By following the instructions I was able to delete the virus The bad news is that you probably have it as you are in my address book More bad news is that my antivirus program did not detect this virus This virus lies dormant for days and then kills your hard drive Here is what to do If you follow the instructions and then see that you have the virus you will need to send a similar email to everyone in your address book TO CHECK AND REMOVE VIRUS Click on START pull up to FIND or SEARCH depending on your computer and click on FOLDERS OR FILES Type in sulfnbkexe this is the name of the virus Make sure you are searching on the C DRIVE Click on FIND NOW If the search finds the virus it will be listed in the box below the search It will have a black icon that will have the name sulfnbkexe DO NOT OPEN THIS FILE RIGHT CLICK on the file and pull down to DELETE It will ask you if you want to delete this file LEFT CLICK YES Go to your desktop where all of your icons are and RIGHT CLICK on the RECYCLE BIN TRASH CAN click on EMPTY THE ENTIRE BIN If you found the virus on your computer you will need to send this message to everybody in your address book because this is how it is transferred

Rush Memo to IPAMS MembershipIPAMS received word today that the Department of the Interior Office of Indian Affairs is holding a National Indian Energy Summit in Denver December at the Adams Mark Hotel starting at am on the th There is no formal registration required and industry participation is welcome For more information see the following link to the details and an agenda energysummit Carla J Wilson Director of Policy Initiatives IPAMS th Street Suite Denver CO FAX
